name: Mac-os-installation-helper
tagline: Mac OS Installation Helper is a tool to that can help you install Mac OS to any supported laptops.
body: Since Apple does not want hardwares, other than their own, support their Operating System. It is a bit tricky to install Mac OS to a unsupported system. Hackintoshers are trying hard for years to get it used in unsupported systems. But still there are many hardwares that is not supported and some hardware may never support Mac OS. El Capitan Installation Helper is a tool that can help you install Mac OS to any supported laptops.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
